body:
Comment 7: 
bzr.exe is not part of Go, it is part of Bazaar Version Control System
(https://launchpad.net/bzr). The author of the package that you're trying to goinstall

goinstall launchpad.net/gorun

is using Bazaar VCS to store/distribute program source.

goinstall is a very simple program and it doesn't implement any functions required to
manipulate source code repositories, instead it just executes correspondent vcs program
(bzr.exe in your case) to perform required operations.

So, if you want to be able to "goinstall" launchpad.net/gorun package, you must install
Bazaar VCS. I haven't done it myself, so I don't know what else will break and can't
guarantee it will work.

Alex
